Question: In 2009, this person won the Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Talk Show Host for her role on The View.
Hints: This person's debut as moderator drew 3.4 million viewers, 1 million fewer than O'Donnell's debut ratings.
On December 18 through 20, 2009, this person performed in the Candlelight Processional at Epcot in Walt Disney World.
This person has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony (for production, not acting), and an Oscar.
